episodes.title: Psychologist DIscusses Lori Vallow Case Updates & Taylor Shabusiness Lawyer Attack
episodes.description:
In this video, Dr. Berry discusses updates in Lori Vallow's trial and Taylor Shabusiness' recent court appearance where she attacked her lawyer. This is not a psychological evaluation and Dr. Berry is providing general opinions based on publicly available information. 

Lawyer You Know's coverage: https://www.youtube.com/live/F9ExBxZTMTo?si=NmSWlRApzAB0oQ5k
Lori Vallow full hearing: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IuQ-ZFvs-54
Lori Vallow jury: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E7-vUh_0GkA
Taylor: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PjyQFYpA_H4
Taylor article: https://fox11online.com/news/local/taylor-schabusiness-attacks-lawyer-in-hearing-pleads-not-guilty-to-sergeant-assault-taycheedah-curtis-julka-withdraw-quinn-jolly-green-bay-shad-thyrion

-------------------------------------------------------------

Join this channel & become a member:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWMTjXDbsvGy4uikByLITVw/join

--------------------------------------------------------------

REFERENCES and RESOURCES to go deeper:

www.psychologytoday.com

www.therapyforblackmen.org
www.openpathcollective.com
https://mydestanation.com/start

--------------------------------------------------------------
I WROTE A BOOK!

If you enjoy my content here or on my other social platforms, then this book is essentially tailored for you. Think of it as a compilation of these videos, presented in a book format, equipped with practical tools that will leave you well-informed and empowered.

Get yours here: Turning Crisis Into Clarity: How to survive or thrive in the midst of uncertainty https://a.co/d/gMwKwcU
(affiliate link, Dr. Berry receives a small commission from qualifying sales)

-------------------------------------------------------------
HI THERE!

If you're new here, welcome! I'm a licensed clinical psychologist who uses social media to educate, break stigma, and give you practical information on a variety of mental health topics. I cover popular topics from media and the court system/law and I also provide information on depression, anxiety, parenting, and healing trauma. All free of shame and judgment....because that's how it should always be. Be sure to subscribe and turn on notifications so you never miss an upload.

-------------------------------------------------------------
BE SOCIAL!

Don't forget to come follow along elsewhere!

episodes.title: Psychologist & Mindset Coach Discuss Changing Thought Patterns After Leaving Cult/High Demand Group
episodes.description:
In this video, Dr. Berry & her mom, Johnnie Lloyd, discuss tips to heal after leaving a cult/high-demand group. Dr. Berry is thankful for this community, and there have been a lot of questions about how to heal after experiencing a cult/high-demand group. This is a great opportunity for us to have this convo!

-------------------------------------------------------------

Join this channel & become a member:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWMTjXDbsvGy4uikByLITVw/join

--------------------------------------------------------------
Resources: 
https://www.cookman.edu/crl/cult-related-activity.html
https://www.colleenrussellmft.com/high-demand-group-or-cult-education-a-recovery
https://cultrecovery101.com/cult-recovery-readings/coming-out-of-the-cults/
How to tell if you are brainwashed: https://youtu.be/JzSwZpHDAaU?si=mG_-rZwJfV3jWuCW

Tools to find a licensed therapist:
www.psychologytoday.com
www.therapyforblackgirls.com
www.therapyforblackmen.org
